smartphones.name: Smartphone Alpha
smartphones.description: A sleek design with a 5.8-inch display and 12MP camera.

smartphones.name: Smartphone Beta
smartphones.description: Features a 6.1-inch display, dual camera system, and water resistance.

smartphones.name: Smartphone Gamma
smartphones.description: Offers a 6.5-inch OLED display, triple-lens camera, and 5G connectivity.

smartphones.name: Smartphone Delta
smartphones.description: Boasts a 120Hz refresh rate, 48MP main camera, and fast charging.

smartphones.name: Smartphone Epsilon
smartphones.description: Features an edge-to-edge display, in-screen fingerprint sensor, and AI-enhanced photography.

smartphones.name: Smartphone Zeta
smartphones.description: A gaming powerhouse with a 144Hz display, shoulder triggers, and cooling system.

smartphones.name: Smartphone Eta
smartphones.description: Ultra-premium design with ceramic back, 108MP camera, and wireless charging.

smartphones.name: Smartphone Theta
smartphones.description: Foldable design with a flexible OLED display and six-camera system.

smartphones.name: Smartphone Iota
smartphones.description: Offers periscope zoom lens, 120x digital zoom, and a custom image sensor.

smartphones.name: Smartphone Kappa
smartphones.description: Top-of-the-line specs with 1TB storage, 16GB RAM, and under-display camera technology.
